meanings.definition: A person who precedes another in an office or position.
meanings.sent1: My antecessor at work trained me on my first day.
meanings.sent2: The antecessor of the current CEO retired last year.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sent an email meant for my antecessor to my boss!
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my antecessor guides me in my new role.
meanings.sent5: The shadow of my antecessor looms large over my responsibilities.

meanings.sent1: My antecessor's portrait hangs proudly in our family home.
meanings.sent2: Learning about my antecessor's life helps me understand my heritage.
meanings.sent3: I found an old diary belonging to my antecessor in the attic!
meanings.sent4: The traditions passed down by my antecessor are cherished in our family.
meanings.sent5: The stories of my antecessor inspire me to carry on their legacy.

meanings.definition: Something that precedes or comes before.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins are an antecessor to modern architecture.
meanings.sent2: The invention of the wheel was an important antecessor to transportation.
meanings.sent3: The appetizer was just a small antecessor to the delicious main course.
meanings.sent4: The first drops of rain were the antecessor to the storm that followed.
meanings.sent5: The first light of dawn is the antecessor to a new day full of possibilities.
